info.name: Firefox Pinned Tab Badge
info.description: Change the appearance of the counter badge in Tab Badge and GMail Helper add-ons for pinned tabs in Firefox.
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT This userstyle require Tab Badge (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tab-badge/) and at least Firefox 35 or a compatible derivative browser. Not compatible with Google Chrome. UPDATES 2015/11/27 • Quick tiny fix for OS X 10.11 • Slightly increased font size (11px instead of 10px) 2015/05/10 • Minor badge positioning fix 2015/04/03 • Original release TIPS Set the badge style to Badge inside tab in the settings of Tab Badge, otherwise this userstyle will not have any visible effect.
